protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol
The normalization was done with the package "affy" of "R". The function used was "rma(Data)".

text: Total RNA was isolated with Trizol (Invitrogen, San Diego, CA, USA) following the manufacturerﾒs recommendation. Following extraction, an additional step of column purification with RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA) was added to ensure the purity of the RNA.
Plants of Arabidopsis thaliana, ecotype Col-0.
Seeds were sowed in soil and kept at 4 C for 2 days (stratification).
After stratification, the pots are transferred to growth conditions, in a walk-in chamber.
Light from 10 am to 6 pm, at 21 C
Dark from 6 pm to 10 am, at 19 C.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)
